
### POSIX process management  {.smaller}


* essential operations 
<hr class="vspace" />
* process information: [<code>getpid</code>]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only}
* process creation: [<code>fork</code>]{.fragment fragment-index=3 .custom .myem-only}
* running programs: [<code>exec*</code>]{.fragment fragment-index=4 .custom .myem-only} 

   *  

* waiting for processes to finish: <code>[waitpid]{.fragment fragment-index=5 .custom .myem-only}</code> [ (or <code>[wait]{.fragment fragment-index=5 .custom .myem-only}</code>)]{.my-small}
* process destruction, ‘signaling’: <code>exit</code>, <code>kill</code>
